overview: Not one but ten Doctors battle it out with their darkest enemy ever, in this first multi-Doctor, multi-verse, full-dome planetarium show starring Colin Baker. Prepare to be taken on the adventure of your lifetimes as you help them battle The Given, an evil force older than the universe itself, in a desperate attempt to thwart his plans and save the universe from total destruction. Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate companion?
title: Arrows of Time
